name: Sister

topics.response_text: They call me Sister. Don't ask.

topics.topic: MS03RCHistory1Could I ask you about Rivet City's history?
topics.topic_text: Have you heard anything about the history of Rivet City?
topics.response_text: Do I look like someone who cares?

topics.topic_text: I found this info about an android from the Commonwealth. Care to elaborate?
topics.response_text: It's none of your God damn business.{arrogant}

topics.topic_text: What do you know about an android from the Commonwealth?
topics.response_text: Here's a copy of the so-called "android recording." I'm done wasting my time on that old job. Don't tell Eulogy though. I kinda like it here.

topics.topic_text: You know anything about an android who needed some surgery?
topics.response_text: I guess I can trust you not to spread it around. Zimmer has put it out that he will pay to find this slave, but he wants him alive.

topics.topic_text: I'll give you 100 caps for what you've got on this android.
topics.response_text: I guess I can trust you not to spread it around. Zimmer has put it out that he will pay to find this slave, but he wants him alive.

topics.topic_text: I'm losing my patience! Tell me about the android with the face job!
topics.response_text: I guess I can trust you not to spread it around. Zimmer has put it out that he will pay to find this slave, but he wants him alive.

topics.topic_text: You have any info on where this Commonwealth android is hiding?
topics.response_text: Why has Zimmer hired you too? I can't find a trace of that robot. I'm sure he's here somewhere though. Don't tell Eulogy I told you, though.

topics.topic_text: Here's a 100 cap "donation." Now, where's that escaped android?
topics.response_text: Why has Zimmer hired you too? I can't find a trace of that robot. I'm sure he's here somewhere though. Don't tell Eulogy I told you, though.

topics.topic_text: Tell me where this android disappeared to, or I'll make you disappear. Got it?
topics.response_text: Why has Zimmer hired you too? I can't find a trace of that robot. I'm sure he's here somewhere though. Don't tell Eulogy I told you, though.

topics.topic_text: But you're a man. Why do they call you Sister?
topics.response_text: Are you making fun of my name? It's a damn good thing for you this place is crawling with security. Otherwise I'd kick your ass.

topics.topic_text: Hey, I don't want any trouble.
topics.response_text: Smart move. What did you want?

topics.topic_text: Did you know that Mei Wong is a runaway slave?

topics.response_text: Um. Yeah. Sorry. Not telling. Change the subject now.{mildly threatening}

conversation.response_text: Armitage.{Said like a greeting, instead of hello.}
I'll get you yet, you bastard.{muttering to himself.}

description:
Sister is a 29 year-old Asian Male.

A towering and intimidating figure in Rivet City, Sister is a 29-year-old Asian man with a reputation for having a hair-trigger temper. Standing at an imposing height with a muscular build, he commands attention wherever he goes. His weathered face bears the scars of numerous brawls, and his eyes constantly scan his surroundings with suspicion. Despite being a slaver by trade, he has managed to avoid being expelled from the relative safety of Rivet City.

Sister's Personality: Sister is a volatile and dangerous individual with a deeply ingrained sociopathic streak. He shows little empathy toward others and views most people as either tools or obstacles. Beneath his aggressive exterior lies a calculating mind that is obsessively focused on his current mission: tracking down a specific individual who has evaded him. He is patient when it serves his purpose but prone to explosive violence when crossed.

Sister's Backstory: Sister was born in the Wastes to parents who were scavengers, though he never knew them well as they were killed in a raider attack when he was young. Growing up on the streets, he learned to survive through intimidation and violence. By his late teens, he had joined a small band of slavers operating near the ruins of Washington D.C. His natural aptitude for tracking and his ruthless efficiency quickly earned him a reputation within the slaving community. Several years ago, Sister accepted a high-profile contract from Zimmer of Paradise Falls to track down a specific individual who had escaped from their clutches. While most slavers would have given up after the trail went cold, Sister became obsessed with this particular quarry.
